subtitleNullable: Mentions of @Dell with sentiments and emotions
descriptionNullable:
The csv dataset contains all the Twitter mentions of Dell during first three quarters of 2022 (Jan 01 - Sept 30) along with the sentiment and emotions of each tweet. It has about 25k tweets along with date, timestamp, username and tweet Id, sentiment, sentiment_score, emotion and emotion_score.

The sentiments and emotions has been classified using 🤗 transformers, check out [this notebook](https://www.kaggle.com/code/ankitkumar2635/sentiment-and-emotion-classification-of-tweets) to learn more.

Sentiments:  positive, negative and neutral
Emotions:  joy, love, optimism, pessimism, trust, surprise, anticipation, sadness, anger, disgust and fear.

The tweets have been scraped using "snscrape" library which does not require Twitter's API access. You can follow [this notebook](https://www.kaggle.com/code/ankitkumar2635/scrape-tweets-using-snscrape-no-api-needed?scriptVersionId=132836323) to learn more about scrapping tweets using "snscrape".
